alert.note: Alert for East Sweetwater County (Wyoming) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 24 at 5:26PM MDT by NWS Riverton
info.description: ...A BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL AFFECT PARTS OF EAST SWEETWATER COUNTY... HAZARDS...A band of heavy snow accompanied by winds of up to 30 MPH which can rapidly reduce visibility to less than one mile. LOCATION AND MOVEMENT...At 525 PM MDT, a band of heavy snow was near Wamsutter moving northeast at 30 MPH. THIS BAND OF HEAVY SNOW WILL BE NEAR... Wamsutter around 530 PM MDT. Creston Junction around 545 PM MDT. This includes Interstate 80 between mile markers 163 and 198. SAFETY INFO... Use extra caution if you must travel into or through this band of heavy snow. Rapid changes in visibility and potentially slick roads may lead to accidents. Conditions can deteriorate rapidly in winter weather situations. Be prepared for snow or ice covered roads. Slow down and allow extra time to reach your destination. &&
